comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The Bain News Agency photo is dated 2/6/14, and comes from their 1914 photostream. Bain seldom touched a story unless it had a New York connection. Why was this Hoffman (Hofman? Hofmann?) in the news in 1914? 

Why does Google maintain an enigmatic silence concerning him and his 1914 whereabouts? If he was news then, why was he never mentioned in the New York Times?

It sounds like the 1931 horse story may be about a different guy.
